summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RodneysBrain AI app-builder MVP. Fixed critical backend authentication issue and verified all core features are working.

fixed_issues.issue: Authentication headers not properly read by protected endpoints
fixed_issues.fix: Updated FastAPI dependency injection to use Header() for Authorization token
fixed_issues.impact: All protected endpoints now work correctly

minor_issues.issue: Projects may not immediately appear in dashboard after creation
minor_issues.impact: User might need to refresh or wait a moment to see new projects

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and prompt input
Example prompts fill input field correctly
Auth modal appears when generating without login
User registration and login flow works
Project creation and navigation to generator
File tabs and code editor functionality
LLM integration with Emergent Universal Key

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, 1 minor UI timing issue)
